page.title: 18FACILITIES IN YEOVIL
page.content: There are quite a few leisure activities in Yeovil for young people,but there are still some facilities we would like here. Here in Yeovil we have an indoor heated swimming pool which costs 35p for children and 65p for adults,, to enter.It also has three different height diving boards. In the town near the centre there is a cinema,which has three viewing rooms in it.Number one is the biggest where the most popular film is shown. There are a large number of Youth Clubs run for teenagers in different areas of Yeovil,which usually meet once or twice a week. There are also several sporting activities and clubs open to young people.The major clubs run 'cub' teams to encourage youngsters and there are matches every weekend and some evening
